channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Again more fly tipping, 9th November
item.description:
Again another load of flytipping outside number 26 kempt street against the wall a SOFA AND CHAIR WITH LOADS OF RUBBISH NRAR IT COME ON ROYAL BOROUGH OF GREENWICH GET THIS SORTED WITH THE CAMERAS YOU PROMISED TO STOP THIS RUDDY MESS WE PAY COUNCIL TAX RENT ALL GONE UO THIS YEAR AND YOUR NOT DOING ANYTHING ABOUT THIS ITS A RUDDY DISGRAXE AS THIS RUBBISH IS ON A WALKWAY WHERE THERE ARE DISABLED PEOPLE IN WHEELCHAIRS LIVE SHOULD BE STOPPED GET THE CAMERAS UP PLEASE
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kempt Street, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip by the tenants of garage in Staff street, 9th November
item.description:
